00058 template <class T> 
00059 class ImageFilterAdaptor :
00060 private InstanceAdaptor <T>,
00061 private ItemAdaptor <T>
00062 {
00063   public:
00065     static int Activate (long version, GlobalFunc *global, void *l, void *serverData)
00066     {
00067       if ( version != LWIMAGEFILTER_VERSION ) return AFUNC_BADVERSION;
00068       
00069       LWImageFilterHandler *local = (LWImageFilterHandler *)l;
00070 
00071       InstanceAdaptor<T>::Activate(local->inst, global);
00072       ItemAdaptor <T>::Activate(local->item);
00073       local->process = ImageFilterAdaptor::Process;
00074       local->flags   = ImageFilterAdaptor::Flags;
00075 
00076       return AFUNC_OK;
00077     }
00078   private:
00079     static void Process (LWInstance instance, const LWFilterAccess *fa)
00080     {
00081       T *plugin = (T *) instance;
00082       plugin->Process(fa);
00083     }
00084 
00085     static unsigned int Flags (LWInstance instance)
00086     {
00087       T *plugin = (T *) instance;
00088       return plugin->Flags();
00089     }
00090 };

00111     static int ActivateUI (long version, GlobalFunc *global, LWInstance u, void *serverData)

00117     }
00118     static int Activate (long version, GlobalFunc *global, LWInstance l, void *serverData) 
00119     {
00120       dostream d;
00121       d << "Activate ImageFilterHandler at: " << l << "\n";
00122       return ImageFilterAdaptor<T>::Activate
00123         (version, global, l, serverData);
